column4: hello, i was wondering which were some good/popular media players...im trying out xmms but i was wondering if there was something more like amarok for gnome or xfce
if you like xmms, use audacious, xmms doesn't come out w/ new versions anymore(that i know of), and audacious is pretty good.
i like it a lot but your mileage may very, similar to xmms, but w/ more options, etc.
depending on the speed of your PC, kde apps might slow it down a tad, whats the system specs?
